# Continuous Path
- Describes the process where by a robot is controlled over the entire path traversed, as opposed to a [point-to-point](Point-to-Point.qmd) method of traversal. This is used when the [trajectory](Trajectory.qmd) of the [end-effector](End-effector.qmd) is most important to provide a smooth movement, such as in spray painting etc
